```{r setup, eval = FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  fig.width = 6,
  fig.asp = 0.6,
  out.width = "90%"
)

theme_set(theme_minimal() + theme(legend.position = "botton"))

options(
  ggplot2.continuous.colour = "viridis",
  ggplot2.continuous.fill = "viridis"
)

scale_colour_discrete = scale_color_viridis_d
scale_fill_discrete = scale_fill_viridis_d

```

## PROBLEM 1

#### Loading instacart dataset

```{r load instacard data}

data("instacart")

instacart_df <- 
  instacart %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()

```
### Instacard data exploration 

```{r intsacart data exploration}

instacart_rows = instacart_df %>% nrow()
instacart_cols = instacart_df %>% ncol()
instacart_names = instacart_df %>% names()

```
